eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Washington; AT 08:15 PM ON NOV 18, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 09:15 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: CANCELLED - The Washington State Patrol on behalf of the Odessa Police Department has cancelled the AMBER Alert.  Gleave's Located
